BNC User Reference Guide

<keywords>

keywords contains a list of keywords or phrases identifying the topic or nature of a text.
Declaration 
element keywords { attribute scheme { data.pointer }?, term+ }
Attributes
(In addition to global attributes)
scheme identifies the controlled vocabulary within which the set of keywords concerned is defined.
Status: Optional
Datatype (1–1) data.pointer
Values: identifier of the associated <taxonomy> element
Example
 <keywords scheme="COPAC"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <term>Fluid dynamics</term>
  <term> Fluids. Dynamics</term>
 </keywords>
 <keywords/>
Module header
